name: IoTFlows Inc
headline: AI-Powered Machine Performance Monitoring
description: IoTFlows provides comprehensive visibility and valuable insights into manufacturing shop floors. Leveraging artificial intelligence to monitor and analyze the performance of machines based on their vibration and acoustics data, we help manufacturers to identify issues and inefficiencies in the production process and make data-driven decisions to improve performance.

founders.name: Mahmoud Parto, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at IoTFlows Inc

founders.name: Ulises Carrasco, Founder
founders.description: Building the next generation of industrial machine connectivity.

# AI-Powered Machine Performance Monitoring
Request Demo
[Try For Free](https://www.iotflows.com/</free-trial>)
SenseAi uses artificial intelligence to monitor and analyze the performance of a machine based on its vibration and acoustics data. This allows manufacturers to identify issues or inefficiencies in the production process and make data-driven decisions to improve performance
Request Demo
[Try For Free](https://www.iotflows.com/</free-trial>)
Watch Video
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.
Watch Video
The world's best organizations trust IoTFlows
IoTFlows Partners
![](https://www.iotflows.com/images/partners/Ericsson-Logo.jpeg)
![SenseAi device](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/singleFlatSenseAi.webp)
###### Simplicity
#### Effortlessly Monitor Your Machines with SenseAi
Unlock the full potential of your manufacturing operations with SenseAi's plug-and-play, AI-powered monitoring solution. SenseAi is designed to easily stick to your machines with its magnetic design, allowing you to monitor and analyze their performance with minimal disruption to your operations
Key Features:
  * Plug-and-play installation
  * Real-time monitoring and data analysis with 4G cellular connectivity.
  * Vibration, acoustics, and LIDAR sensors provide comprehensive machine performance analysis.
  * Real-time notifications of machine downtime.
  * Monitor multiple facilities or production lines.


###### Visibility
#### Gain visibility into your manufacturing processes like never before
Improve your manufacturing operations with real-time machine utilization monitoring.
  * Monitoring of overall equipment effectiveness (OEE) and identification of areas for improvement.
  * Machine utilization data and comparison across departments and work shifts.
  * Notifications of machine down times


![IoTFlows Asset Visibility](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/AssetVisibility.webp)
###### Optimize
#### Track part production, operations, and cycle times in one simple view
Analyze part production, gain up-to-date visibility into cycle times, easily track performance and identify bottlenecks to maximize your manufacturing output. Whether you are managing a single production line or multiple facilities, we help you stay on top of your operations and make informed decisions to drive success.
![IoTFlows Asset Visibility](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/AssetOptimize.webp)
###### 2-Minute Setup
Step 1
Scan QR Code
![SenseAi Device](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/backVerticalSenseAi.webp)
Step 2
Attach to Machine
![CNC machine](https://www.iotflows.com/images/machines/TurningCncMachine.webp)
Step 3
Get Insights
![Mobile view](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/AssetPhoneView.webp)
###### Operator View
#### Empower Your Shop-floor with Real-Time Production Visibility
Shop-floor operators can now gain real-time visibility into machine production and status, enabling them to monitor the performance of their equipment and maximize their efficiency. Operators can categorize downtime, track activity, and analyze historical performance.
![IoTFlows Asset Visibility](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/AssetsOperatorView.webp)
###### Project Tracking
#### Streamline Your Project Management and Reach your Goals, Faster
We make it easy to track and manage your projects, helping you stay on track and achieve your goals. With real-time visibility into project timelines and progress, you can stay organized and focused, enabling you to achieve success in your projects
![IoTFlows Asset Visibility](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/projectTimeline2.webp)
###### Reports
#### Insights into Manufacturing Machine Performance
Unlock a deeper understanding of your manufacturing processes with our comprehensive machine performance reports. Access daily performance snapshots, track trending changes over time, and gain valuable insights into shift-wise productivity. Empower your team with data-driven decision-making and optimize your operations for peak efficiency with our detailed and user-friendly reports.
![IoTFlows Asset Visibility](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/iPadReportShadow.webp)
###### Notifications
#### AI-Powered Monitoring for Uninterrupted Production
Empower your manufacturing floor with real-time AI alerts! Our cutting-edge AI-powered system vigilantly monitors your manufacturing floor, instantly alerting you of any issues like machine downtime or abnormal vibrations. Stay in control, minimize downtime, and maximize efficiency with real-time notifications, ensuring smooth operations and peak performance.
![IoTFlows Notifications](https://www.iotflows.com/images/SenseAi/notifications2.webp)
###### How much are your machines worth to you?
Number of machines needed to be optimized
10 Machines
How much is one hour of machine time worth to you?
$
/hr
ROI per machine per year with SenseAi
$48,120
[Try For Free](https://www.iotflows.com/</free-trial>)
How did we get this number?
Time optimized per machine per day
30 minutes

48
Total cost of SenseAi per year
$11,880
Total ROI per year
$48,120
###### Optimized for Your Most Valued Assets

![Milling CNC](https://www.iotflows.com/images/machines/MillingCncMachine.webp)
![Injection Molding](https://www.iotflows.com/images/machines/InjectionMoldingMachineLeft.webp)
Injection Molding

Detect press production and gather productivity data.
![Press](https://www.iotflows.com/images/machines/PressMachine.webp)
![Robot](https://www.iotflows.com/images/machines/Robot.webp)
Robot

Production Lines

![Production Lines](https://www.iotflows.com/images/machines/productionLineMachine.webp)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: IoTFlows Inc**

Founded in 2020 and based in Atlanta, GA, IoTFlows Inc is a rising star in the world of industrial IoT analytics. This company emerged from Y Combinator's Batch W22 and has evolved to specialize in AI-powered machine performance monitoring. Their primary mission? To provide manufacturers with comprehensive visibility and critical insights into shop floor operations through advanced analytics that harness vibration and acoustics data from machines.

### What They Do

At the core of IoTFlows’ offering is *SenseAi*, an AI-powered device that seamlessly attaches to machinery, allowing for a hassle-free, plug-and-play installation. This device collects data in real-time, enabling manufacturers to proactively identify inefficiencies and performance issues, thereby facilitating data-driven decision-making. Alongside this, their *Console* IoT platform connects, controls, and maintains these devices, amplifying operational efficiency across various production lines.

Key features include:
- Real-time monitoring using advanced sensors (including LIDAR)
- Notifications for machine downtime
- Comprehensive performance analytics, comparing utilization across shifts and departments

### Why It Matters

In today's fast-paced manufacturing environment, downtime can be catastrophic. IoTFlows provides the tools to monitor machine performance around the clock, helping companies avoid costly interruptions and maximize productivity. The potential ROI is significant: they estimate that optimizing just ten machines could lead to a return of over $400,000 per year.

### The Team

IoTFlows has grown to a team of 60 talented employees, spearheaded by Group Partner Diana Hu. Their collective expertise in artificial intelligence, deep learning, machine learning, and manufacturing positions them as a capable and innovative partner for manufacturers looking to bolster operational efficiency through advanced technology.

### Engaging with IoTFlows

Interested manufacturers can explore IoTFlows’ offerings further through their website [iotflows.com](https://www.iotflows.com). They provide extensive documentation and guides for integrating their services, making it easy for new users to get started. Plus, the option for a demo allows potential clients to see firsthand how their solutions can transform their manufacturing processes.

In summary, IoTFlows Inc stands at the intersection of AI and manufacturing, ready to help factories transcend traditional limitations, leveraging data to drive tangible improvements in machine performance. If you're in the manufacturing space, this is a company to keep an eye on.
